messages: Someday, someone may experience{~N}these bizarre events. Hopefully,{~N}they will find my notes useful.{~E}
{~D}I don't have the map{~N}for this place.{~E}
{~D}Too dark to look{~N}at the map here.{~E}
There is a {~C2}First aid kit{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
The lock is jammed.{~N}This door can't be opened.{~E}
There is an {~C2}Examination room key{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
Looks like a hallway{~N}under the grate.
Can't move it since the vines{~N}have grown around it.{~E}
No.{~N}The fire goes out right away{~N}when I light the vines.{~E}
Do you want to push{~N}the cabinet?{~S4}
There are skid marks from{~N}the cabinet being moved.{~E}
A bed? What's it doing here?{~N}Who would...{~E}
A body is laid out on the bed.{~N}Don't feel like checking this out.{~E}
There's a bottle filled{~N}with some kind of drug.{~N}Better leave it.{~E}
Nothing special in the box.{~N}Nothing to worry about.{~E}
